DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study determine measurement characteristic WHODAS-II ( World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule ) , well analyze correlation low back pain ( Visual Analog Scale , VAS ) , disability ( Spanish version Roland Morris Questionnaire , RMQ ) , fear avoidance belief attitude ( Spanish version FAB Questionnaire , FABQ ) quality life ( SF-12 ) . Measurements take baseline 6 day later ( day 7 ) .
DOC.brief_title: WHODAS-II Patients With Nonspecific Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Patients see nonspecific low back pain , without refer pain Able read write Have sign inform consent form Central nervous system pathology ( without treatment ) Diagnosis rheumatic inflammatory disease fibromyalgia Red flag underlie systemic disease Criteria diagnosis symptomatic herniated disc symptomatic spinal stenosis
